## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G40390](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G40390)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RS5, SIP1</u>
- **Gene Name:** raffinose synthase 5, seed imbibition 1-like
- **Description:**   Raffinose synthase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
